name: Bullywug Royal
proficiencies: Saving Throw: STR +5 | Saving Throw: DEX +3 | Skill: Athletics +5 | Skill: Intimidation +4, Stealth +3

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
special_abilities.desc: The royal can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Brute.
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Frog Rider.
special_abilities.desc: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads.
special_abilities.desc: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap.
special_abilities.desc: The royalâ€™s long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage.
special_abilities.desc: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

actions.name: Royal SpearMelee or Ranged Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: BiteMelee Weapon Attack:
actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Croaked Decree (1/Day).
actions.desc: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.
